column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Makes sense. We're both still in school, we can't be raising children.
Thanks for always being so understanding.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Are you sure?! We're still in school, you know!
I am, trust me. I'll take responsibility.
….Fufu~, alright then, if you're going so far to say that, then I'll believe you.
